title: Jennifer Garner looks like a chic soccer mom as she takes her kids to practice in Brentwood
text:
Jennifer Garner was the most stylish soccer mom of the bunch when she stepped out with her two youngest kids Seraphina and Sam on Saturday.

The actress ex of Ben Affleck looked down to earth wearing a cream zip-up with snug black leggings.

Jennifer, 47, kept her look understated with some dark shades, dressing things up just a hint with a gold necklace.

Kick it up: Jennifer Garner looked like a stylish soccer mom when she stepped out for her kid's practice on Saturday

The star made herself comfortable, bringing along a pair of portable chairs for the outing.

After she set up her chairs, Jen peeled off her outer layer to reveal her toned arms wearing a dark tank top.

The Camping actress sipped on an iced coffee while daughter Seraphina, 10, sat on mom's lap and snacked on an apple. Meanwhile, Sam, seven, looked engrossed in a book.

Simply stylish: The actress ex of Ben Affleck looked down to earth wearing a cream zip-up with snug black leggings

Close connection: Jennifer's daughter Seraphina, 10, sat on mom's lap during the sunny fall day

Flexy: After she set up her chairs, Jen peeled off her outer layer to reveal her toned arms wearing a dark tank top

Jennifer is quite the hands-on mom.

She recently revealed why she's blocked 13-year-old daughter Violet from joining Instagram during an appearance on Next Question With Katie Couric.

'I just say, when you can show me studies that say that teenage girls are happier using Instagram than not, then we can have the conversation,' she explained on Katie's podcast.

Book worm: Sam, seven, looked engrossed in a book

'But everything you look at, I don't see anything positive for you out there,' Jennifer explained.

She has allowed Violet access to her own account as an alternative to getting their own.

'You can look at mine when you want to, we can go over it together, but I just don't see it,' she added.
description: Jennifer Garner was the most stylish soccer mom of the bunch when she stepped out with her kids Seraphina and Sam on Saturday.
